languages.text: Спустя годы имя Маражая вновь громко прозвучало в Просторе. Его банда перехватила корабль Астарции Версериан. Ее голова была доставлена Абеляру с запиской, сообщающей, что это — "презент от старого знакомого в память о славном прошлом". Ядовитое горе, обуявшее Абеляра, отправило его в долгую шестилетнюю охоту за презренным ксеносом, увы, не увенчавшуюся успехом.

Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.
languages.original_text: Спустя годы имя Маражая вновь громко прозвучало в Просторе. Его банда перехватила корабль Астарции Версериан. Ее голова была доставлена Абеляру с запиской, сообщающей, что это — "презент от старого знакомого в память о славном прошлом". Ядовитое горе, обуявшее Абеляра, отправило его в долгую шестилетнюю охоту за презренным ксеносом, увы, не увенчавшуюся успехом.

traits.locale_text: Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a long six-year hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, did not succeed.

Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a long six-year hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, did not succeed.

Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.

Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.

Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.

languages.text: 多年之后，玛拉斋的名字再次响彻科罗努斯扩区。他的团伙截获了艾丝塔西娅·韦尔森的舰船，砍掉了她的脑袋，寄给了阿贝拉德。和艾丝塔西娅的头一起寄过去的还有一张小纸条，上面写着这是他的“老熟人送给他的礼物，纪念过去的美好时光”。阿贝拉德悲痛不已，花了整整六年的时间寻找玛拉斋的下落，但却徒劳无功。
languages.original_text: Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.

traits.locale_text: 多年之后，玛拉斋的名字再次响彻科罗努斯扩区。他的团伙截获了艾丝塔西娅·韦尔森的舰船，砍掉了她的脑袋，寄给了阿贝拉德。和艾丝塔西娅的头一起寄过去的还有一张小纸条，上面写着这是他的“老熟人送给他的礼物，纪念过去的美好时光”。阿贝拉德悲痛不已，花了整整六年的时间寻找玛拉斋的下落，但却徒劳无功。

languages.text: 数年後、マラズハイの名前はエクスパンスで再び知れ渡るようになった。彼の一味はアスタルチア・ウェルザリアンの船を撃墜した。彼女の頭部は「古い知人より、輝かしい過去の思い出として」という手紙とともにアベラルドのもとへ届けられた。深い悲しみに暮れたアベラルドはこの卑劣な異種族を追いかけ6年もの間旅に出たが、残念な結果に終わった。
languages.original_text: Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.

traits.locale_text: 数年後、マラズハイの名前はエクスパンスで再び知れ渡るようになった。彼の一味はアスタルチア・ウェルザリアンの船を撃墜した。彼女の頭部は「古い知人より、輝かしい過去の思い出として」という手紙とともにアベラルドのもとへ届けられた。深い悲しみに暮れたアベラルドはこの卑劣な異種族を追いかけ6年もの間旅に出たが、残念な結果に終わった。

languages.text: Des années plus tard, le nom de Marazhai résonna à nouveau à travers les Étendues. Sa bande avait intercepté le vaisseau d'Astartia Werserian, dont la tête fut livrée à Abélard avec un message l'informant qu'il s'agissait « d'un cadeau d'une vieille connaissance, en souvenir du glorieux passé ». Ivre de chagrin, Abélard se lança dans une traque de six ans pour retrouver le méprisable xénos, mais hélas, en pure perte.
languages.original_text: Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.

traits.locale_text: Des années plus tard, le nom de Marazhai résonna à nouveau à travers les Étendues. Sa bande avait intercepté le vaisseau d'Astartia Werserian, dont la tête fut livrée à Abélard avec un message l'informant qu'il s'agissait « d'un cadeau d'une vieille connaissance, en souvenir du glorieux passé ». Ivre de chagrin, Abélard se lança dans une traque de six ans pour retrouver le méprisable xénos, mais hélas, en pure perte.

languages.text: Años después, el nombre de Marazhai volvió a resonar por la Extensión. Su banda había interceptado la nave de Astartia Werserian. Envió su cabeza a Abelard con una nota que la consideraba «un regalo de un viejo amigo en recuerdo de un pasado glorioso». El dolor de Abelard le hizo perseguir al odioso xenos durante seis largos años, pero, por desgracia, sus esfuerzos fueron en vano.
languages.original_text: Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.

traits.locale_text: Años después, el nombre de Marazhai volvió a resonar por la Extensión. Su banda había interceptado la nave de Astartia Werserian. Envió su cabeza a Abelard con una nota que la consideraba «un regalo de un viejo amigo en recuerdo de un pasado glorioso». El dolor de Abelard le hizo perseguir al odioso xenos durante seis largos años, pero, por desgracia, sus esfuerzos fueron en vano.

languages.text: Jahre später erklang Marazhais Name erneut in der Ausdehnung. Seine Bande hatte Astartia Werserians Schiff abgefangen. Ihr Kopf wurde an Abelard geliefert, mit einer Nachricht, er sei "ein Geschenk von einem alten Bekannten, in Erinnerung an eine ruhmreiche Vergangenheit". Trauernd begab Abelard sich auf eine sechsjährige Jagd auf den widerwärtigen Xenos, leider ohne Erfolg.
languages.original_text: Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.

traits.locale_text: Jahre später erklang Marazhais Name erneut in der Ausdehnung. Seine Bande hatte Astartia Werserians Schiff abgefangen. Ihr Kopf wurde an Abelard geliefert, mit einer Nachricht, er sei "ein Geschenk von einem alten Bekannten, in Erinnerung an eine ruhmreiche Vergangenheit". Trauernd begab Abelard sich auf eine sechsjährige Jagd auf den widerwärtigen Xenos, leider ohne Erfolg.

languages.text: Marazhai'ın ismi, yıllar sonra Enginlik'te bir kez daha duyuldu. Çetesi, Astartia Werserian'ın gemisine saldırdı. Astartia'nın kellesi, "geçmiş günlerin görkeminin anısına, eski bir dosttan bir armağan" yazan bir not eşliğinde Abelard'a gönderildi. Abelard öylesine büyük bir kedere gömüldü ki aşağılık zenonun peşinde altı yıl sürecek bir ava çıktı ancak maalesef başarılı olamadı.
languages.original_text: Years later, Marazhai's name resounded through the Expanse once more. His gang had intercepted Astartia Werserian's ship. Her head was delivered to Abelard with a note informing him that it was "a gift from an old acquaintance in remembrance of a glorious past." Abelard's grief sent him on a six-year-long hunt for the despicable xenos, which, sadly, was unsuccessful.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai'ın ismi yıllar sonra Enginlik'te bir kez daha duyuldu. Çetesi, Astartia Werserian'ın gemisine bir saldırı düzenledi. Astartia'nın kellesi, "geçmiş günlerin görkeminin anısına, eski bir dosttan bir armağan" yazan bir not eşliğinde Abelard'a gönderildi. Abelard öylesine büyük bir kedere gömüldü ki aşağılık zenonun peşinden altı yıl sürecek bir ava çıktı ancak maalesef başarılı olamadı.
